metadata.title: CVE-2022-2455 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A business logic issue in the handling of large repositories in allversions of GitLab CE/EE from 10.0 before 15.1.6, all versions startingfrom 15.2 before 15.2.4, all versions starting from 15.3 before 15.3.2allowed an authenticated and authorized user to exhaust server resources byimporting a malicious project.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
